Readout Register Hold enableRegister: REGHOLD*4Address: 3001h
Readout counted frame number.Count range: 1 to 254dIn standby: 0d
Readout Black level setting.Register: BLKLEVEL*4Address: 0x300A-300B
Readout CSI-2 Output data formatRegister: CSI_DT_FMT*4Address: 0x333E-333F
Readout gain setting value.Register: GAIN*4Address: 0x3014
Readout SHS1 Setting valueRegister: SHS1*4Address: 0x3020-3022
In master modeReadout XHS numbers of 1 frame period.Register: VMAX*4Address:0x3018-301A
In master modeReadout clock number of 1 H period.Register: HMAX*4Address:0x301B-301C

In Window cropping modeReadout Y-direction starting addresscoodinatesRegister: WINPV*4Address:0x3038-3039
In Window cropping modeReadout X-direction end addresscoordinates
In Window cropping modeReadout Y-direction end addresscoordinates.
In Window cropping modeReadout X-direction extraction width.Register: WINWH*4Address:0x303E-303F
In Window cropping modeReadout Y-direction extraction width.Register: WINWV*4Address:0x303A-303B
Readout Scaling mode00h: Normal, 01h:V Inverted10h: H Inverted, 11h: V&H Inverted
Readout Lane setting valueRegister: CSI_Lane_MODE*4Address: 0x3340h
In Window cropping modeReadout Y-direction end addresscoordinates of OB.
